required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Different Fresh Gas Flows on Carboxyhemoglobin Levels
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Different Fresh Gas Flows on Carboxyhemoglobin Levels: Noninvasive Carbon Monoxide Monitoring

brief_summary.textblock: To observe the effect of different fresh flows (1 L / min and 4 L / min) on the carboxyhemoglobin level non-invasively and continuous measurement and to determine the contribution of smoking to the intraoperative carbon monoxide accumulation.

primary_outcome.measure: effects of different fresh gas flows on carboxyhemoglobin levels
primary_outcome.description: To observe the effect of different fresh flows (1 L / min and 4 L / min) on the carboxyhemoglobin level by non-invasive and continuous measurement.

secondary_outcome.measure: effects of smoking on carbon monoxide accumulation.
secondary_outcome.description: to determine the contribution of smoking to intraoperative carbon monoxide accumulation.

arm_group.description: administered 4 L/min fresh gas flow during general anesthesia
administered 1 L/min fresh gas flow during general anesthesia

intervention.description: COHb measurement monitoring from finger pulp with a non-invasive measurement device called Masimo Radical-7 Pulse co-oximeter (Masimo Corporation, Irvine, USA)

study_pop.textblock: A total of 60 patients in ASA I-II risk group, aged 18-65, undergoing 2-4 hours of elective surgery

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ASA I-II
- Undergo 2-4 hours of elective surgery
Exclusion Criteria:
- Cardiovascular disease
- diabetes mellitus
- kidney, liver failure
- chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
- patients with opioid sensitivity
- morbidly obese
- personal or family history of malignant hyperthermia
- history of prolonged recovery from anesthesia
- alcohol addicted
- pregnant and breastfeeding women patients allergic to study drugs

facility.name: Zonguldak Bülent Ecevit University Medicine Faculty
